channel.title: The Hodljuice Daily Pint
channel.itunes:author: curated by Hodljuice
channel.description: Daily collection of various Bitcoin-related podcasts

item.title: Bitcoin and Markets : ETF Options Approval and Central Bankers Attack Bitcoin With Nonsense - E410
item.itunes:author: Bitcoin and Markets
item.itunes:keywords: ETF options approval, Central banks, Macroeconomic analysis, Research in finance
item.description: This episode discusses recent developments in ETF options approval and examines tactics by central bankers to undermine Bitcoin. It highlights macroeconomic factors influencing Bitcoin and critiques traditional financial rhetoric. The importance of conducting personal research amidst misinformation in the financial landscape is emphasized.

item.title: Bitcoin Audible : Chat 117-Bitcoin Threat Vectors on Final Settlement
item.itunes:author: Bitcoin Audible
item.itunes:keywords: Custodial threats, Secure custody, Bitcoin security, Personal security incident
item.description: This episode tackles custodial threat vectors and security challenges unique to Bitcoin. Insights are shared from a personal security incident that highlights the need for secure custody. The evolution of Bitcoin custody and the importance of multisig setups are discussed. The episode raises awareness about the risks in securing Bitcoin as the industry grows.

item.title: BTC Sessions : WHY ARE WE BULLISH? David Branscum, Aladdin (BTC Cards), Nathan Fitzsimmons (The BTC Mentor) ep251
item.itunes:author: BTC Sessions
item.itunes:keywords: Bullish sentiment, Investment strategies, Self-custody, Hardware wallets
item.description: This episode features a panel discussion on the bullish sentiment around Bitcoin and various strategies for investment and self-custody. Key insights involve the importance of self-custody and benefits of hardware wallets. The panelists share their experiences related to Bitcoin's recent market behavior, emphasizing privacy in transactions.

item.title: Coin Stories : 'News Block: Bitcoin Enters Price Discovery After Trump Win, Fed Cuts Rates Again, Bond Yields Rise Amid Inflation Fears'
item.itunes:author: Coin Stories
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin price discovery, Political developments, Institutional adoption, Economic indicators
item.description: This week's episode covers major headlines related to Bitcoin and global finance post-Trump's election win. It discusses implications of rate cuts by the Federal Reserve and rising bond yields amid inflation fears. The episode highlights Bitcoin's institutional adoption and significant market dynamics influenced by politics.

item.title: Fractal Bitcoin : Bitcoin 3rd day all-time highs! $420K in 2025?! Global FOMO incoming! - Ep.217
item.itunes:author: Fractal Bitcoin
item.itunes:keywords: Price forecasts, Bitcoin ETFs, Adoption trends, Economic transformations
item.description: Today's episode highlights Bitcoin's entry into price discovery mode with analysts predicting significant price targets. It discusses recent ETF developments surpassing those of gold and historical perspectives on Bitcoin adoption. Noteworthy events include significant Bitcoin purchases and shifts in governmental acceptance of cryptocurrency.

item.title: Onramp Media : 'The Last Trade E073: The Orange Wave with Larry Lepard & David Foley'
item.itunes:author: Onramp Media
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin and monetary policy, Strategic reserves, Economic insights
item.description: This episode discusses Bitcoin in the context of upcoming elections and its influence on monetary policy. It explores the significance of a supportive administration for Bitcoin adoption and the concept of a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve. The discussion emphasizes Bitcoin’s role in the current economic landscape and market dynamics.

item.title: Pleb Underground : Bitcoin Mining CRISIS On The Horizon?
item.itunes:author: Pleb Underground
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin mining challenges, Operational costs, Resource allocation, Market trends
item.description: This episode addresses the potential crisis in Bitcoin mining due to rising operational costs and declining profitability. It examines resource shifts from mining to AI and Galaxy Digital's recent struggles. The hosts discuss the implications of these trends within the broader cryptocurrency landscape.

item.title: Robin Seyer : 'Trillion-Dollar BTC Bet: Microstrategy Soon Biggest Firm in the world?'
item.itunes:author: Robin Seyer
item.itunes:keywords: MicroStrategy, Bitcoin as a commodity, Future of finance
item.description: Tim Kotzman shares insights about his journey into Bitcoin and discusses MicroStrategy's potential as a trillion-dollar firm. The episode emphasizes Bitcoin’s role as a commodity within the evolving economy and highlights the need for accessible avenues for engagement with cryptocurrency.

item.title: Simply Bitcoin : 'BREAKING: Central Banker EXPOSED In BOMBSHELL Interview | EP 1115'
item.itunes:author: Simply Bitcoin
item.itunes:keywords: Central banking policies, Monetary policy, Digital currency implications
item.description: This episode covers Jerome Powell's revealing interview regarding central banking policies and their implications for the economy. The discussion includes analysis of monetary policy and its potential consequences for Bitcoin and the broader financial landscape. This episode reflects on important economic changes.

item.title: Swan Signal Live A Bitcoin Show : Is This the Start of a Super Cycle?
item.itunes:author: Swan Signal Live A Bitcoin Show
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin price trends, Government Bitcoin policies, ETF impacts, Market cycles
item.description: This episode analyzes Bitcoin's developments post-Trump’s victory, discussing potential price super cycles and government support for Bitcoin. Key insights include significant inflows into Bitcoin ETFs and ongoing discussions about the Fed's policies. The general sentiment suggests a transformative phase for Bitcoin adoption.

item.title: TFTC A Bitcoin Podcast : '#554: UAP Disclosure Is Upon Us with Matt Pines'
item.itunes:author: TFTC A Bitcoin Podcast
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin policy implications, UAP disclosures, Geopolitical insights
item.description: This episode features a discussion on Bitcoin policy under Trump and the anticipated public disclosure regarding UAPs. Key topics address the evolution of institutions, the importance of strategic thinking, and the implications of geopolitical shifts on Bitcoin. The conversation unfolds various angles related to current events.

item.title: The Mark Moss Show : China Fires A Monetary Bazooka... Will It Be Enough?
item.itunes:author: The Mark Moss Show
item.itunes:keywords: China's economic policy, Global market impact, Investment strategies
item.description: This episode discusses China's bold monetary policy actions aimed at rescuing its economy and the implications for global markets, including Bitcoin. It delves into historical impacts of similar moves on asset prices, providing listeners with insights on positioning their investments. The potential opportunities and risks of this monetary strategy are examined.

item.title: The Transformation of Value : What is Nuclear Energy with Nick Touran
item.itunes:author: The Transformation of Value
item.itunes:keywords: Nuclear energy, Regulatory challenges, Economic implications
item.description: In this episode, Nick Touran discusses the intricate realities surrounding nuclear energy. The conversation covers its historical context, current global challenges, and the future outlook for nuclear technology and energy abundance.

item.title: The What is Money Show : Can Trump Save the West? Freedom, Peterson vs. Dawkins, COVID & Bitcoin w/ Bret Weinstein (WiM529)
item.itunes:author: The What is Money Show
item.itunes:keywords: Political discourse, Technology impact, Evolution of ideas
item.description: Dr. Bret Weinstein discusses various topics including incentives in evolution, Trump's potential impact on democracy, and the intersection of technology with academia. The conversation explores key debates and issues surrounding freedom, societal evolution, and the global struggle between liberty and control.

item.title: Token Metrics Daily Podcast : Rate Down, Crypto Up, BTC Tax
item.itunes:author: Token Metrics Daily Podcast
item.itunes:keywords: Cryptocurrency market response, Economic indicators, Local cryptocurrency adoption
item.description: Today's episode discusses the surge in cryptocurrency values following the US Federal Reserve's interest rate decision. It highlights a city's strong embrace of cryptocurrency, emphasizing the proactive role of crypto in informing events.

item.title: BTC Sessions : 1st Pro-Bitcoin President Wins Landslide: What Lies Ahead for Bitcoin? ep450
item.itunes:author: BTC Sessions
item.itunes:keywords: Pro-Bitcoin Politics, Corporate Bitcoin Adoption, Strategic Reserves, Market Analysis
item.description: This episode covers the historic win of the first pro-Bitcoin U.S. president and its implications for the Bitcoin industry. It also discusses Deutsche Telekom's mining initiative and speculates on a potential U.S. Bitcoin reserve. The hosts delve into the market impacts of MicroStrategy's substantial Bitcoin purchase as well.

item.title: Bitcoin Takeover Podcast : S15 E64: David Johnston on Bitcoin 2.0 & Decentralized AI
item.itunes:author: Bitcoin Takeover Podcast
item.itunes:keywords: Decentralization, Bitcoin Technology, AI, Innovation
item.description: In this episode, David A. Johnston discusses his philosophy on decentralization, which posits that everything that can be decentralized will be. He reflects on his past work with the Omni layer and shares his perspective on decentralized AI.

item.title: Bitcoin Markets : Microsoft Votes On Bitcoin, BRICS Launch Dollar Killer - E411
item.itunes:author: Bitcoin Markets
item.itunes:keywords: Geopolitics, Macroeconomics, Bitcoin Adoption, Currency Competition
item.description: This episode explores Microsoft's engagement with Bitcoin and the introduction of a BRICS currency aimed at countering the U.S. dollar. The hosts analyze the geopolitical and macroeconomic implications of these developments and emphasize the importance of independent research.

item.title: Bitcoin and Markets : Microsoft Votes On Bitcoin, BRICS Launch Dollar Killer - E411
item.itunes:author: Bitcoin and Markets
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin and Geopolitics, Currency Dynamics, Economic Analysis
item.description: The hosts discuss Microsoft's support for Bitcoin and how BRICS nations aim to challenge the U.S. dollar's dominance. They go into macroeconomic implications and share insights that underscore the importance of thorough research for understanding the evolving cryptocurrency landscape.

item.title: Bitcoin for Millennials : Former crypto degenerate shares why only Bitcoin matters | Arsen Thagapsov | BFM097
item.itunes:author: Bitcoin for Millennials
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin Philosophy, Industry Insights, Personal Journey
item.description: Arsen Thagapsov shares his transformative journey in the Bitcoin space, highlighting his work with Bitcoin Therapy and his views on Bitcoin's significance compared to altcoins. The episode includes discussions on financial education, Bitcoin's impact on society, and its future potential.

item.title: Coin Stories with Natalie Brunell : Col. Douglas Macgregor: Next Trump Presidency, the Economy & World War III
item.itunes:author: Coin Stories with Natalie Brunell
item.itunes:keywords: Economic Forecast, Political Analysis, Global Conflict
item.description: Col. Douglas Macgregor discusses the economic future under the next presidential administration, warning of potential financial crises. He examines the roles of gold, Bitcoin, and cash in investment strategies, as well as the risks of escalating global conflicts.

item.title: Fractal Bitcoin : Bitcoin soaring, riding the wave UP! Countries will FOMO soon! Nostr turns 4! - Ep.216
item.itunes:author: Fractal Bitcoin
item.itunes:keywords: Market Trends, Institutional Adoption, Economic Indicators
item.description: The episode discusses Bitcoin's recent price surge and its potential to reach $100,000 before the next presidential inauguration. Analysts talk about the significance of the U.S. possibly approving Bitcoin as a strategic reserve asset and its implications for institutional interest and global engagement.

item.title: Galaxy Brains : Trump Win and Bitcoin
item.itunes:author: Galaxy Brains
item.itunes:keywords: Market Implications, Election Analysis, Cryptocurrency Outlook
item.description: Alex Thorn and Beimnet Abebe discuss the ramifications of Trump's election victory for the cryptocurrency market. They provide insights on what the election results mean for Bitcoin's future trajectory.

item.title: Once Bitten A Bitcoin Podcast : How Bitcoin Changed My Life. @hldbtc #502
item.itunes:author: Once Bitten A Bitcoin Podcast
item.itunes:keywords: Personal Transformation, Bitcoin Impact, Life Changes
item.description: Caleb shares his personal journey and the profound effects Bitcoin has had on his life across various aspects, including professional, personal, and spiritual dimensions. He emphasizes the significance of gradual changes for long-term transformation.

item.title: Pleb Underground : Bitcoin Hits NEW ATH!
item.itunes:author: Pleb Underground
item.itunes:keywords: Price Surges, Market Analysis, Community Insights
item.description: The hosts analyze the recent surge in Bitcoin prices while addressing concerns related to MT GOX. They discuss the implications of potential actions from long-held Bitcoin hodlers and share personal experiences with market volatility and FUD.

item.title: Rabbit Hole Recap : THE FIRST BITCOIN ELECTION | RABBIT HOLE RECAP #330
item.itunes:author: Rabbit Hole Recap
item.itunes:keywords: Election Dynamics, Bitcoin Prices, Human Rights
item.description: This episode reviews the recent all-time high for Bitcoin amidst a political landscape shaped by a red election sweep. The hosts explore the implications of the Trump administration for Bitcoin and discuss notable events like the Human Rights Foundation's bitcoin initiative in South America.

item.title: Robin Seyer : Carlos Estrada: Get to 0.1 Bitcoin before 2025!
item.itunes:author: Robin Seyer
item.itunes:keywords: Education, Business Adoption, Bitcoin Culture
item.description: Carlos Estrada shares his passion for Bitcoin and its unique qualities, stressing the importance of smart business practices and financial education amidst inflation. The discussion points to Bitcoin's potential to reform business and economic structures, along with its cultural implications.

item.title: Simply Bitcoin : $4.2T Bank Makes A Bitcoin Backflip! | EP 1114
item.itunes:author: Simply Bitcoin
item.itunes:keywords: Institutional Change, Bitcoin Investment, Market Dynamics
item.description: The hosts discuss a notable shift from a major Bitcoin critic to a bullish stance, analyzing its implications for the banking sector and cryptocurrency market. They investigate the motivations behind this change and what it means for Bitcoin’s future as a viable asset class.

item.title: The Bitcoin Layer : Store Your Bitcoin SECURELY: Multi-Sig & Key Control
item.itunes:author: The Bitcoin Layer
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin Security, Multi-Signature Solutions, Key Management
item.description: Nik and Unchained co-founders discuss the distinctive security needs of Bitcoin compared to traditional financial assets. They provide insights on multi-signature security, key management, and the logistical aspects of Bitcoin custody and inheritance planning.

item.title: The Canadian Bitcoiners Podcast : The CBP - Bitcoin's Destiny w/ Sly, R. Goomba
item.itunes:author: The Canadian Bitcoiners Podcast
item.itunes:keywords: Bitcoin Culture, Canadian Ecosystem, Community Engagement
item.description: The episode features a conversation with Sly, R. Goomba about the impact of Bitcoin on Canadian culture and lifestyle. The discussion covers a range of topics, emphasizing the importance of community insights and reiterating that the information shared is not financial advice.

item.title: The Mark Moss Show : Can We Ever Escape This Modern-Day Tribalism? | Tom Woods
item.itunes:author: The Mark Moss Show
item.itunes:keywords: Social Commentary, Freedom, Historical Context
item.description: Tom Woods joins the show to discuss societal division and the impact of social media on modern tribalism. They explore historical parallels and the ongoing tension between individual autonomy and collective control, framing the conversation around freedom.

item.title: Token Metrics Daily Podcast : TRUMP Will Affect YOUR BAG for Real
item.itunes:author: Token Metrics Daily Podcast
item.itunes:keywords: Market Response, Political Influence, Crypto Insights
item.description: This episode examines the ongoing market response to Trump's win and discusses the potential landscape for cryptocurrencies in his new term. The hosts provide insights and trends relevant to cryptocurrency investors.
